attributes.action: legally waive criminals human rights if performing any unlawful act, or during any subsequent court proceedings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any criminal performing any unlawful act, should have their rights to this act legally withheld, to prevent the potential for abuse, misuse, evasion of responsibility, self-profit or material gain by the morally unjustified application of this crazy Act.
